This app was written by Karen Coppage and Maddie Lansbury, without the permission of BKK.


 Riding without a valid ticket may result in a penalty fee.


 Conditions of penalty fare payment

1. Penalty fare paid on the spot

 If you pay the penalty fare in cash on the spot, the amount to be paid decreases to HUF 8,000. The ticket inspector must provide you with a receipt for the on-the-spot payment.
 
2. Retrospective payment of on-the-spot penalty fare
 The on-the-spot penalty fare (HUF 8,000) can be settled retrospectively via cash or credit card payment at one of the following locations: Penalty Fare Office (Budapest, District 7, Akácfa u. 22), Main Customer Service Centre (Budapest, District 7, Rumbach Sebestyén utca 19-21), Kelenföld vasútállomás Metro Station Customer Service Centre (Budapest, District 11, Kelenföld railway station underpass) or Széll Kálmán tér Customer Service Centre (Buda, District 2) within 2 working days after surcharging. You will receive an incoming payment document certifying your payment.
 
3. Presentation of the pass and cash or bankcard payment at one of the following locations: 

 Penalty Fare Office (Budapest, District 7, Akácfa u. 22), Main Customer Service Centre (Budapest, District 7, Rumbach Sebestyén utca 19-21), Kelenföld vasútállomás Metro Station Customer Service Centre (Budapest, District 11, Kelenföld railway station underpass) or Széll Kálmán tér Customer Service Centre (Buda, District 2)
 You will receive an incoming payment document certifying your payment.
